Package org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Interface IsEventProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AddHandlerEventHandler, EventHandler, RemoveHandlerEventHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEventElementHandler, AbstractPieOptions, Animation, BarOptions, BaseGeoOptions, BubbleMapOptions, BubbleOptions, ChoroplethOptions, ConfigurationOptions, DoughnutOptions, EventAxesHandler, EventSubtitleHandler, EventTitleHandler, GaugeOptions, HorizontalBarOptions, Legend, LineOptions, MatrixOptions, MeterOptions, PieOptions, PolarAreaOptions, RadarOptions, SankeyOptions, ScalesOptions, ScatterOptions, StackedOptions, TimeSeriesBarOptions, TimeSeriesLineOptions, TimeSeriesOptions, TreeMapOptions, VerticalLineOptions
    interface IsEventProvider
extends AddHandlerEventHandler, RemoveHandlerEventHandler
    Interface to be bale to catch and manage chart events to events handlers.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
